name: SimplyCast
tag_list: multi-channel-marketing, interactive-marketing, email-marketing, online-surveys, twitter-marketing, autoresponder, sms-marketing, list-management, link-tracking, fax-marketing
overview:
SimplyCast.com is a leading provider of interactive marketing software and services for organizations worldwide. The company’s multi-channel marketing platform is a feature-rich solution used by thousands of customers in over 175 countries, including many of the most recognized brand names around the globe in retail, non-profit and hospitality industries. With thousands of organizations using SimplyCast solutions to automate email, survey, event, sms, fax, and autoresponder marketing needs, they now have the power to effectively reach customers on their preferred mode of communication.

Sign up for our Epic Free marketing plan today and send up to 30,000 emails, 50 faxes and 5 SMS messages for free every month.

Now that is multi-channel marketing solved!

milestones.description: SimplyCast.com, a global leader in multi-channel marketing Platform-as-a-Service solutions, has released Version 7.0 of its online marketing application, moving to the forefront of multi-channel marketing automation.

milestones.description: SimplyCast.com, a leader in multi-channel marketing Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) solution for organizations worldwide, announced it has elected J. William (Bill) Ritchie as the Chairman of its Board of Directors.

milestones.description: SimplyCast.com, a leader in multi-channel marketing Platform-as-a-service (PaaS) solution for organizations worldwide, has been listed as one of the Top 10 Canadian cloud companies to watch.

milestones.description: SimplyCast.com, a leader in multi-channel marketing software-as-a-service (SaaS) solution for organizations worldwide, announced the launch of the SimplyCast Affiliate Network (SAN).
milestones.source_description: SimplyCast Launches Affiliate Network For All-In-One Marketing Platform

milestones.description: SimplyCast.com, a leader in multi-channel marketing Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) solutions for organizations worldwide, announced that Jennifer Jackson, an MBA student at Dalhousie University, has joined the company and will act as Director of Internation
milestones.source_description: SimplyCast Partners with Dalhousie Corporate Residency MBA Program

milestones.description: SimplyCast, a leading provider of email marketing solutions for organizations worldwide, today announced that its Board of Directors has named Mr. Saeed A. El-Darahali to serve as the organization's President and Chief Executive Officer.
milestones.source_description: Nova Scotia Email Marketing Corporation Attracts Top Talent
